EmailTemplate.subject: Announcement - Livongo Demonstrates Cost Savings for Employers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I'm reaching out today with some exciting news. We're starting to get our hands on medical claims data, which allows us to truly measure the impact of Livongo - and our data science team just released a study demonstrating a cost savings of $83 per participant per month.
$83 per participant per month!
This is a promising proof point, and it highlights why employers like Lowe's, SAP, PepsiCo, and Iron Mountain have implemented Livongo.
I'd love to talk with you to learn more about how Livongo could impact {!Account.Name}.
Thank you.
Best regards,
Adam Claypool Director of Commercial Operations Livongo m: 314.346.2964 o: 312-357-5285 x143 e: aclaypool@livongo.com a: 444 N. Michigan Ave., Ste 2880, Chicago, IL 60622 www.livongo.com
